snippet: Kelvin Cochran wrote and gave workers copies of his book, in which he wrote that homosexuality was among “vile, vulgar and inappropriate” activities.
abstract: Atlanta Mayor Kasim Reed fires Fire Rescue Department chief Kelvin Cochran after Cochran gave workers copies of religious book he wrote containing antigay passages, sparking debate about religious liberty and nondiscrimination.
lead_paragraph: Kelvin Cochran wrote and gave workers copies of his book, in which he wrote that homosexuality was among “vile, vulgar and inappropriate” activities.

headline.main: Atlanta Ousts Fire Chief Who Has Antigay Views
headline.print_headline: Atlanta Ousts Fire Chief Who Has Antigay Views
